house_listing.house_description: Most popular model in a desirable area. Tastefully deco with paper & paint. Formal liv/din room with tray ceiling and columns. Master suite w/bath includes separate shower, vault ceil & plant shelves. Eat-in kitchen w/white cabinets & more
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Contemporary Style,Fenced, Foyer, Utility Room, Walk-In Closet(s)
